About Me

Hey there! My name is Maijs Garais (my’s gah-rye-s, IPA: /maɪjs garaɪs/; I also go by Mai for short), and I am an enthusiastic developer with a passion for learning and getting better. I have worked as an Android Developer in the past, but currently am more focused on web development, in particular using React.js.

You can find me on LinkedIn and GitHub.

Site information

This site is powered by Jekyll, a static website generator. The CSS is Bootstrap v5.0, with a few tweaks by me.

The coding and writing is done on VS Code. Landing page photo shot on a Zenit.
